name: We're All Fans Here DEMO
description:
Morwenna and Nigel go on a strange mission to "The Infinite Lands".  But this place is more than it seems. . .

The full game is coming out for Spring Thing on April 5.

Morwenna and Nigel are from Three Guys That Paint: https://katy133.itch.io/three-guys-that-paint

Carmine is from the Checkerboard Series, which can be played here: https://daffs.itch.io/
